fields.value:
- Generate (Black)(Red) each night.
- (1): Attack a player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Partner *(There may be two Gatherer Commanders if at least one of them has partner.)*
- The first time a Gatherer activates an ability that costs mana each night, you deal an attack equal to the amount of mana that ability costs to a non-Gatherer player chosen at random. This resolves immediately (when the ability is declared).
